questions.question_text: Management wants to bring their organization into compliance with the ISO standard for information security risk management. Which ISO standard will management decide to implement?
Which of the following systems includes an independent NAS Head and multiple storage arrays?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
CND Book P.1306
The gateway NAS System contains storage arrays and a separate NAS head Separate

questions.question_text: You are monitoring your network traffic with the Wireshark utility and noticed that your network is experiencing a large amount of traffic from a certain region. You suspect a DoS incident on the network. What will be your first reaction as a first responder?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Making an initial assessment helps determine the scale and nature of the attack, allowing for more effective response actions, such as mitigation, communication, or further investigation.

Selected Answer: A
CND Book P.2127

Fear, Uncertainty, and Doubt (FUD) is not a new concept for organizations. Any incident can create an environment of fear and anxiety among the team. A security incident outbreak is often very stressful and brings about a lot of doubt and uncertainty. Decisions made in fear and anxiety will worsen the situation. Usually, small-sized companies do not have an Incident Response Team (IRT). In such scenarios, first responders usually lack the confidence required to deal with an incident.
B. Unstructured. I just went through the class and instructor brought up this exact question and explained there is nothing in the question about being "internal".

Selected Answer: B
CND Book P.9

comments.content: Unintentional threat is the best answer.

discussion.content: I'm not really sure about this question, but CND Book P.8-9 classify this theat as unintentional, and it make sense. The structured and unstructured threats are part of external threats

Selected Answer: D
D. Internal Threats

questions.question_text: If a network is at risk resulting from misconfiguration performed by unskilled and/or unqualified individuals, what type of threat is this?
Which of the following acts as a verifier for the certificate authority?

discussion.content: registration authority (RA) that acts as the verifier for the CA
